    Hello, my name is Haotian Bai(白皓天). I am currently pursuing a Ph.D. in computer vision, AI Thrust, at HKUST’s Guangzhou campus. I am a part of Vlislab research team, supervised by Prof. Addison Lin Wang(王林).

    In my spare time, I enjoy cooking, playing basketball, listening to music, and learning about starting a business.

    My primary research interests are in 3D reconstruction, with a focus on Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) and its applications using multi-model data. I am also interested in robotics, specifically simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM). Beyond that, my personal research interests include graph theory, complex systems, life science especially aging, physics(thermodynamics),and deep reinforcement learning (DRL). My papers are accepted at prestigious AI conferences such as CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, and NeurIPS. I also serve as reviewers on well known journals including TPAMI, TOMM, and TIP. Please feel free to comment on Github for further discussion on my works.

    Recently,

    • I am working with Prof.Haoxiang Li on photoemission spectroscopy for quantum materials.
    • I am working with Prof.Yize Chen on reinforcement learning with Large Language Model(LLM).
    • I am working with Bonan Liu and Prof. Pan Hui on 3D vision and robotics.
